last_episode_to_air.name: THE HOLY NEWBORN
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Soul Reapers regroup to prepare their counterattack against the Quincies.

name: Bleach
overview: For as long as he can remember, Ichigo Kurosaki has been able to see ghosts. But when he meets Rukia, a Soul Reaper who battles evil spirits known as Hollows, he finds his life is changed forever. Now, with a newfound wealth of spiritual energy, Ichigo discovers his true calling: to protect the living and the dead from evil.

episodes.name: The Day I Became a Shinigami
episodes.overview: Fifteen-year-old Ichigo Kurosaki has the uncanny ability to see ghosts, but otherwise lives an ordinary life. However, once a Shinigami named Rukia Kuchiki appears before him, everything changes.

episodes.name: A Shinigami's Work
episodes.overview: After becoming a Shinigami, Ichigo Kurosaki refuses to help Rukia Kuchiki with her work as the local Shinigami of Karakura Town.

episodes.name: The Older Brother's Wish, the Younger Sister's Wish
episodes.overview: When a Hollowfied Sora Inoue attacks his younger sister, Ichigo Kurosaki and Rukia Kuchiki set out to save her.

episodes.name: Cursed Parakeet
episodes.overview: When Yasutora Sado receives a parakeet that contains the Soul of a young boy, it is up to Ichigo Kurosaki and Rukia Kuchiki to protect him from the Hollow that is after them.

episodes.name: Beat the Invisible Enemy!
episodes.overview: Rukia Kuchiki and Yasutora Sado team up to take on the Hollow Shrieker.

episodes.name: Fight to the Death! Ichigo vs. Ichigo
episodes.overview: At Rukia Kuchiki's behest, Ichigo Kurosaki puts an artificial soul in his body to take care of it and not arouse suspicion while he carries out his Substitute Shinigami duties, but the artificial soul has its own agenda.

episodes.name: Greetings from a Stuffed Lion
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki becomes friends with the Modified Soul, Kon, and puts him into a plushie.

episodes.name: June 17, Memories in the Rain
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki goes to his mother's grave with the rest of his family.

episodes.name: Unbeatable Enemy
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki battles against Grand Fisher.

episodes.name: Assault on Trip at Sacred Ground!
episodes.overview: While grudgingly attending Don Kanonji's show with the rest of his family, Ichigo Kurosaki is forced to fight a Hollow inadvertently created by Don Kanonji himself.

episodes.name: The Legendary Quincy
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Rukia Kuchiki meet Uryū Ishida, a Quincy.

episodes.name: A Gentle Right Arm
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki begins his duel with Uryū Ishida, Yasutora Sado gains a new power.

episodes.name: Flower and Hollow
episodes.overview: Orihime Inoue gains a new power in order to protect Tatsuki Arisawa.

episodes.name: Back to Back, a Fight to the Death!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Uryū Ishida work together to defeat a Menos Grande.

episodes.name: Kon's Great Plan
episodes.overview: Kon decides to run away from the Kurosaki Clinic as Soul Society comes after Rukia Kuchiki.

episodes.name: The Encounter, Abarai Renji!
episodes.overview: Two Shinigami, 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai and Captain Byakuya Kuchiki, arrive in the Human World to take Rukia Kuchiki back to the Soul Society.

episodes.name: Ichigo Dies!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki loses his Shinigami powers and Rukia Kuchiki is taken back to Soul Society.

episodes.name: Reclaim! The Power of the Shinigami!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki begins his training with Kisuke Urahara to regain his Shinigami powers and save Rukia Kuchiki.

episodes.name: Ichigo Becomes a Hollow!
episodes.overview: Kisuke Urahara helps Ichigo Kurosaki regain his Shinigami powers.

episodes.name: Ichimaru Gin's Shadow
episodes.overview: After completing their training, Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends depart to Soul Society to rescue Rukia Kuchiki.

episodes.name: Enter! The World of the Shinigami
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends enter Soul Society.

episodes.name: The Man who Hates Shinigami
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends are forced to find another way into Seireitei due to 3rd Division Captain Gin Ichimaru's intervention.

episodes.name: 14 Days Before Rukia's Execution
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends enter the household of the Shiba Clan.

episodes.name: Assemble! The 13 Divisions
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends begin their preparations to get into the Seireitei, the Gotei 13 captains assemble for a meeting.

episodes.name: Penetrate the Center with an Enormous Bombshell?
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends enter the Seireitei.

episodes.name: Formation! The Worst Tag
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends are scattered throughout the Seireitei, where they encounter new enemies.

episodes.name: Release the Death Blow!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki completes his battle with 11th Division 3rd Seat Ikkaku Madarame while his friends continue to progress through the Seireitei.

episodes.name: Orihime Targeted
episodes.overview: Ganju Shiba wins his battle against 11th Division 5th Seat Yumichika Ayasegawa while Uryū Ishida begins his own.

episodes.name: Breakthrough! The Shinigami's Encompassing Net
episodes.overview: Uryū Ishida defeats 7th Division 4th Seat Jirōbō Ikkanzaka while Ichigo Kurosaki and Ganju Shiba encounter 4th Division 7th Seat Hanatarō Yamada, who personally knows Rukia Kuchiki.

episodes.name: Renji's Confrontation
episodes.overview: Having been led to the base of Senzaikyū, Ichigo Kurosaki begins his rematch with 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai.

episodes.name: The Resolution to Kill
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai conclude their rematch.

episodes.name: Stars and the Stray
episodes.overview: 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai remembers his past with Rukia Kuchiki and begs Ichigo Kurosaki to save her in his stead.

episodes.name: Miracle! The Mysterious New Hero
episodes.overview: In the Human World, Yuzu Kurosaki finds a cat named Raku and is drawn into an adventure with Don Kanonji and his Karakura-Raizer Team.

episodes.name: Tragedy of Dawn
episodes.overview: As the Gotei 13 reacts to 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai's defeat, Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto declares war against the Ryoka.

episodes.name: Aizen Assassinated! The Darkness which Approaches
episodes.overview: While the Gotei 13 deals with the death of 5th Division Captain Sōsuke Aizen, Ichigo Kurosaki and his group attempt to enter Senzaikyū once again.

episodes.name: Zaraki Kenpachi Approaches!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki begins his battle with 11th Division Captain Kenpachi Zaraki.

episodes.name: Motive of the Fist
episodes.overview: Yasutora Sado battles with 8th Division captain, Shunsui Kyōraku.

episodes.name: Desperation! The Broken Zangetsu
episodes.overview: As the high-ranking members of the Gotei 13 continue to react to 5th Division Captain Sōsuke Aizen's murder, Ichigo Kurosaki continues his battle with 11th Division Captain Kenpachi Zaraki.

episodes.name: The Immortal Man
episodes.overview: After learning to access the power of Zangetsu in addition to his own, Ichigo Kurosaki concludes his battle with 11th Division Captain Kenpachi Zaraki.

episodes.name: The Shinigami whom Ganju Met
episodes.overview: While 11th Division Lieutenant Yachiru Kusajishi reminisces about her history with her captain, Kenpachi Zaraki, Ganju Shiba and 4th Division 7th Seat Hanatarō Yamada reach Rukia Kuchiki's cell in Senzaikyū.

episodes.name: Reunion, Ichigo and Rukia
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki arrives at the White Tower and reunites with Rukia Kuchiki.

episodes.name: Yoruichi, Goddess of Flash, Dances!
episodes.overview: Yoruichi Shihōin saves Ichigo Kurosaki and decides to help him attain Bankai.

episodes.name: The Despicable Shinigami
episodes.overview: Uryū Ishida and Orihime Inoue are confronted by 12th Division Captain Mayuri Kurotsuchi.

episodes.name: Ishida Ultimate Power!
episodes.overview: Uryū Ishida removes his Sanrei Glove to defeat 12th Division Captain Mayuri Kurotsuchi.

episodes.name: Overcome Your Limits!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki begins his Bankai Training.

episodes.name: Authentic Records! School of Shinigami
episodes.overview: 5th Division Lieutenant Momo Hinamori recalls her past at the Shin'ō Academy.

episodes.name: The Avengers
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki continues his Bankai Training, 5th Division Lieutenant Momo Hinamori confronts 10th Division Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya over the contents of the letter left by her captain, Sōsuke Aizen.

episodes.name: Hitsugaya Roars!
episodes.overview: 10th Division Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya battles 3rd Division Captain Gin Ichimaru.

episodes.name: Rukia's Nightmare
episodes.overview: Rukia Kuchiki recalls her past with Kaien Shiba.

episodes.name: The Reviving Lion
episodes.overview: The Karakura Superheroes come together once more and fight a Hollow.

episodes.name: Morning of the Sentence
episodes.overview: As the day of Rukia Kuchiki's execution arrives, various groups around the Seireitei move out and clash with one another.

episodes.name: Renji, Oath of the Soul! Death Match with Byakuya
episodes.overview: 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai battles his captain, Byakuya Kuchiki.

episodes.name: Ichimaru Gin's Temptation, Resolution Shattered
episodes.overview: 11th Division Captain Kenpachi Zaraki and his subordinates battle the 7th and 9th Division captains and lieutenants.

episodes.name: An Accomplished Oath! Get back Rukia!
episodes.overview: Rukia Kuchiki's execution ceremony commences, but does not proceed as planned.

episodes.name: The Strongest Shinigami! Ultimate Confrontation Between Teacher and Students
episodes.overview: After the interruption of Rukia Kuchiki's execution, battles commence all across the Seireitei.

episodes.name: Supersonic Battle! Determine the Goddess of Battle
episodes.overview: Yoruichi Shihōin battles 2nd Division Captain Suì-Fēng.

episodes.name: Senbonzakura, Crushed! Zangetsu Thrusts through the Sky
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Captain Byakuya Kuchiki continue their battle.

episodes.name: Unseal! The Black Blade, the Miraculous Power
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and 6th Division Captain Byakuya Kuchiki activate their Bankai.

episodes.name: Conclusion of the Death Match! White Pride and Black Desire
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and 6th Division Captain Byakuya Kuchiki's battle reaches its conclusion.

episodes.name: Reality of the Despair, the Assassin's Dagger is Swung
episodes.overview: A conspiracy connecting several recent events in Soul Society is revealed.

episodes.name: Aizen Stands! Horrible Ambitions
episodes.overview: 4th Division Lieutenant Isane Kotetsu informs the Gotei 13 that Sōsuke Aizen is alive as the latter reveals his machinations.

episodes.name: Gather Together! Group of the Strongest Shinigami!
episodes.overview: 5th Division Captain Sōsuke Aizen removes the Hōgyoku from Rukia Kuchiki's Soul and retreats to Hueco Mundo.

episodes.name: Rukia's Resolution, Ichigo's Feelings
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends say their goodbyes in Soul Society before heading back home through the Dangai.

episodes.name: New School Term, Renji Has Come to the Material World?!
episodes.overview: As the lives of Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends begin to return to normal, three mysterious figures appear and abduct Orihime Inoue.

episodes.name: Creeping Terror, the Second Victim
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki, Uryū Ishida, Yasutora Sado, and 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai are forced to play a game in order to find Orihime Inoue.

episodes.name: Breakthrough! The Trap Hidden in the Labyrinth
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki, Lieutenant Renji Abarai, and Uryū Ishida must navigate a labyrinth in order to free their friends.

episodes.name: Death Game! The Missing Classmate
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends must deduce the identity of an impostor in their midst.

episodes.name: True Identity of the Devil, the Secret which Is Revealed
episodes.overview: The truth about the Mod-Souls is revealed as a new enemy appears.

episodes.name: Bount! The Ones Who Hunt Souls
episodes.overview: The Mod-Souls receive new bodies as Ichigo Kurosaki encounters a Bount for the first time.

episodes.name: Rukia's Return! Revival of the Substitute Team!
episodes.overview: Two new Bount appear as one takes an interest in Uryū Ishida.

episodes.name: The Moment of Collision! An Evil Hand Draws Near to the Quincy
episodes.overview: With Ryō Utagawa attempting to devour his Soul, Uryū Ishida finds himself abducted and saved by Yoshino Sōma.

episodes.name: Water Attack! Escape from the Shutdown Hospital
episodes.overview: While Uryū Ishida is in the hospital, his friends must fight two Bount who can control water.

episodes.name: Gathering Bounts! The Man Who Makes His Move
episodes.overview: Ganju Shiba and 4th Division 7th Seat Hanatarō Yamada help conclude the fight against Hō and Ban.

episodes.name: Memories of an Eternally Living Clan
episodes.overview: Uryū Ishida gets to know Yoshino Sōma while 11th Division Captain Kenpachi Zaraki and his lieutenant, Yachiru Kusajishi, discover that a former member of their division is in Karakura Town.

episodes.name: Earth-Shattering Event at 11th Squad! The Shinigami Who Rises Again
episodes.overview: 12th Division Captain Mayuri Kurotsuchi informs the Gotei 13 of his missing data on the Bount while Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends break into the Bount Mansion to save Uryū Ishida.

episodes.name: Crashing Force! Fried vs. Zangetsu
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki faces off against Ryō Utagawa, who ends up betraying Jin Kariya with the intention of dethroning him.

episodes.name: Unfading Grudge! The Shinigami whom Kenpachi Killed
episodes.overview: Maki Ichinose remembers his past as he and Jin Kariya battle Ichigo Kurosaki.

episodes.name: Shocking Revelations for the 13 Divisions!! The Truth Buried in History
episodes.overview: Uryū Ishida tries to understand more about Yoshino Sōma as Ichigo Kurosaki spars with 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai and Ganju Shiba in order to regain his fighting spirit.

episodes.name: Yoshino's Decision of Death
episodes.overview: Yoshino Sōma makes a final stand against Jin Kariya in order to redeem herself.

episodes.name: Assault from a Formidable Enemy! A Tiny Final Line of Defense?!
episodes.overview: At Kisuke Urahara's request, Ririn, Kurōdo, and Noba prepare anti-Bount traps around the Kurosaki Clinic, but are angered when Ichigo Kurosaki brushes them off as pointless and unhelpful.

episodes.name: Hitsugaya Moves! The Attacked City
episodes.overview: The Bitto' attack Karakura Town, allowing the Bount to grow stronger, while 10th Division Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya briefs his strike force on their mission in Soul Society.

episodes.name: Ichigo vs. Dalk! Appearance of the Faded Darkness
episodes.overview: 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai fights off the Bitto, who are quickly recalled, while Ichigo Kurosaki battles Gō Koga's Doll, Dalk, in her new form.

episodes.name: Grey Shadow, the Secret of the Dolls
episodes.overview: Gō Koga tells Ichigo Kurosaki that he reminds him of a boy from his past, Cain, whom Koga was assigned to train by Jin Kariya until tragedy struck.

episodes.name: Dissension in the Substitute Team? Rukia's Betrayal
episodes.overview: 3rd Division Lieutenant Izuru Kira fends off Gō Koga's Doll, Dalk, while Mabashi arrives to take over for a struggling Yoshi.

episodes.name: Deadly Battle of Tears! Rukia vs. Orihime
episodes.overview: Mabashi uses his Doll, Ritz, to take control of Rukia Kuchiki's body and force her to fight her friends.

episodes.name: Rangiku Dances! Slice the Invisible Enemy!
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Rangiku Matsumoto, Yasutora Sado, Noba, and Ururu Tsumugiya face off against the old Bount, Sawatari, and his Doll, Baura.

episodes.name: Byakuya is summoned! The Gotei 13 start to move!
episodes.overview: Sawatari retreats while an invisible intruder enters Soul Society. Uryū Ishida remembers training to become a Quincy.

episodes.name: Annihilation of the Lieutenants!? Trap in the Underground Cave
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and company head off to the Bounts' cave, only to encounter Ugaki's Doll, Gesell.

episodes.name: Rematch?! Ishida vs. Nemu
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and friends continue to fight Gesell as Lieutenant Nemu Kurotsuchi presents Uryū Ishida with a battle accessory.

episodes.name: Renji Abarai, Bankai of the Soul!
episodes.overview: Gesell turns on its master. Ichigo Kurosaki attempts to fight Jin Kariya with little success.

episodes.name: Shinigami and Quincy, the Reviving Power
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki initiates Bankai, but Uryū Ishida completes the Bounts' portal, allowing them to enter Soul Society.

episodes.name: Invasion of the Shinigami World, Again
episodes.overview: The Bounts arrive in Soul Society. Rukia Kuchiki meets up with Yoshi once more.

episodes.name: The Bount Assault! The Gotei 13 of Destructive Earthquake
episodes.overview: Rukia Kuchiki squares off against Yoshi. Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto informs the other captains of the Bounts' origins.

episodes.name: Hitsugaya's Decision! The Clash Approaches
episodes.overview: Jin Kariya recruits men from Kusajishi as Ichigo Kurosaki and friends finally arrive at Kūkaku Shiba's house.

episodes.name: Byakuya Takes the Field! Dance of the Wind-Splitting Cherry Blossoms
episodes.overview: Captain Byakuya Kuchiki battles Jin Kariya when Ichigo Kurosaki shows up to help.

episodes.name: Ichigo, Byakuya, Kariya, The Battle of the Three Extremes!
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki and Captain Byakuya Kuchiki continue to fight a continuously healing Jin Kariya, Ran'Tao shows up, prompting Kariya to leave.

episodes.name: Hitsugaya Strikes! Slice the Enemy in the Middle of the Forest
episodes.overview: Ran'Tao reveals the reason for her resemblance to Yoshino Sōma as Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya faces off against Maki Ichinose.

episodes.name: Clash! Kenpachi Zaraki vs. Maki Ichinose
episodes.overview: Captain Kenpachi Zaraki arrives to stop Maki Ichinose.

episodes.name: Shinigami vs. Shinigami! The Uncontrollable Power
episodes.overview: The Bounts break into Seireitei and Captain Suì-Fēng encounters Mabashi.

episodes.name: Suì-Fēng Dies? The Last of the Special Forces
episodes.overview: Captain Suì-Fēng survives her poisoning by using her own poison to nullify Mabashi's, and kills Mabashi.

episodes.name: Mayuri's Bankai!! Sawatari: Clash of the Demon
episodes.overview: Captain Mayuri Kurotsuchi, of the 12th Division, battles against the Bount, Sawatari.

episodes.name: The Last Quincy! The Exploding Power
episodes.overview: As Jin Kariya looks for the Jokai Crest, Uryū Ishida battles the Bount, Yoshi.

episodes.name: Ishida, Exceeding the Limits to Attack!
episodes.overview: As Uryū Ishida defeats the Bount, Yoshi, Jin Kariya prepares to destroy the Soul Society.

episodes.name: 10th Division's Death Struggle! The Release of Hyōrinmaru
episodes.overview: 10th Division Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya battles against the Bount, Gō Koga.

episodes.name: Kariya! Countdown to the Detonation
episodes.overview: As the Shinigami learn more about the Jōkaishō, Ran'Tao confronts Jin Kariya.

episodes.name: Life and Revenge! Ishida, the Ultimate Choice
episodes.overview: Uryū Ishida confronts the Bount, Jin Kariya.

episodes.name: The Swung-Down Edge! The Moment of Ruin
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki and Jin Kariya battle each other, the Shinigami look for the other Jōkaishō to re-seal them.

episodes.name: The Wailing Bount! The Last Clash
episodes.overview: The battle between Ichigo Kurosaki and Jin Kariya concludes.

episodes.name: Ichigo and Rukia, Thoughts in the Revolving Around Heaven
episodes.overview: Following the battle with the Bounts, things slowly return to normal.

episodes.name: Reopening of the Substitute Business! The Terrifying Transfer Student
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki goes back to slaying Hollows in the Human World, but he is soon confronted by Shinji Hirako - a Visored.

episodes.name: Shock! The Father's True Identity
episodes.overview: Isshin Kurosaki reveals himself as a Shinigami and fights Grand Fisher.

episodes.name: The Commencement of War, Vizards and the Arrancars
episodes.overview: Information on the Visored and Arrancar is revealed.

episodes.name: Prelude to the Apocalypse, The Arrancar's Offensive
episodes.overview: Arrancar arrive in the Human World.

episodes.name: Reunion, Ichigo and Rukia and Soul Reapers
episodes.overview: The Arrancar leave the Human World while the Gotei 13 send help to protect the Human World.

episodes.name: Mission! The Soul Reapers Have Come
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki regains his confidence to fight again. Later, more facts about the Arrancar are revealed.

episodes.name: The Evil Eye, Aizen Returns
episodes.overview: The Arrancar arrive in the Human World, again.

episodes.name: Rukia's Battle Commences! The Freezing White Blade
episodes.overview: Rukia Kuchiki battles against the Arrancar, Di Roy Rinker.

episodes.name: Ikkaku's Bankai! The Power That Breaks Everything
episodes.overview: 3rd Seat Ikkaku Madarame battles against the Arrancar, Edrad Liones.

episodes.name: Zaraki Division's Secret Story! The Lucky Men
episodes.overview: 3rd Seat Ikkaku Madarame recalls when he joined the 11th Division.

episodes.name: Hitsugaya Scatters! The Broken Hyōrinmaru
episodes.overview: The battles with the Arrancar continue.

episodes.name: Clash! The Protector vs. The Bearer
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez battle each other.

episodes.name: Vizard! The Power of the Awakened
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki goes to where the Visored are in hopes of learning how to control his Hollowfication.

episodes.name: Ichigo, Complete Hollowification!?
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki begins training to control his Hollowfication.

episodes.name: Collision! Black Bankai and the White Bankai
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki continues his battle with his inner Hollow.

episodes.name: Urgent Report! Aizen's Terrifying Plan!
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki successfully controls his Hollow, Sōsuke Aizen's plans are revealed.

episodes.name: Uryū vs. Ryūken! Clash of the Parent-Child Quincys
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki is informed of Sōsuke Aizen's plans, Uryū Ishida finishes his training.

episodes.name: Urahara's Decision, Orihime's Thoughts
episodes.overview: Orihime Inoue is told that she won't be allowed to fight in the upcoming battles.

episodes.name: The Nightmare Arrancar! Team Hitsugaya Moves Out
episodes.overview: The Shinigami in the Human World find a boy named Shōta Toyokawa.

episodes.name: The Swooping Descent of the Dark Emissary! The Propagation of Malice
episodes.overview: The Shinigami help out Shōta Toyokawa and Yui Toyokawa.

episodes.name: The Invisible Enemy! Hitsugaya's Merciless Decision
episodes.overview: The Shinigami look for the Cloning Arrancar.

episodes.name: Rangiku's Tears, the Sorrowful Parting of Brother and Sister
episodes.overview: The Shinigami face off against the Cloning Arrancar.

episodes.name: Hitsugaya, Karin, and Soccer Ball
episodes.overview: Karin Kurosaki tries to get Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya to help her win an upcoming soccer match.

episodes.name: Ikkaku: The Hot-Blooded Kendo Tale
episodes.overview: 3rd Seat Ikkaku Madarame helps a school student named Shinji Iijima win a Kendō tournament.

episodes.name: The Beautiful Patissier, Yumichika!
episodes.overview: 5th Seat Yumichika Ayasegawa helps a Plus named Heita Momoyama bake a cake for his mother.

episodes.name: Kon is Deceived! Rangiku on the Lookout...
episodes.overview: Kon is forced to live with a girl named Miyuki.

episodes.name: Civil War in Hueco Mundo! Ulquiorra's Death
episodes.overview: Several Arrancar betray Sōsuke Aizen and steal the Hōgyoku.

episodes.name: The Malicious Battle, Aizen's Trap
episodes.overview: The rogue Arrancar are defeated by the Shinigami.

episodes.name: Hueco Mundo moves again! Hitsugaya vs. Yammy
episodes.overview: Several Arrancar head into the Human World.

episodes.name: Ichigo vs. Grimmjow, the 11-second battle!
episodes.overview: As the battles with the Arrancar continue, Ichigo Kurosaki shows off his new power.

episodes.name: Ulquiorra's Scheme, the Moment when the Sun Sets!
episodes.overview: The battles conclude as the Arrancar head back into Hueco Mundo.

episodes.name: Goodbye..., Kurosaki!
episodes.overview: Orihime Inoue says goodbye to Ichigo Kurosaki before leaving for Hueco Mundo.

episodes.name: Strict Order! The Forbidden Rescue of Orihime Inoue
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki learns of Orihime Inoue's disappearance and decides to rescue her.

episodes.name: Grimmjow Revived
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki, Uryū Ishida, and Yasutora Sado head to Hueco Mundo.

episodes.name: Ishida and Chad, The Quickening of a New Power
episodes.overview: Uryū Ishida and Yasutora Sado show off their new strength after arriving in Hueco Mundo.

episodes.name: The Espada Gather! Aizen's Royal Assembly
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki and his friends head to Las Noches, Sōsuke Aizen holds a meeting with the Espada.

episodes.name: The Name's Nel! The Appearance of a Strange Arrancar
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki meets the Arrancar Nel Tu and a Guardian causes some trouble.

episodes.name: Forest of Menos! Search for the Missing Rukia
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and the others are forced into the Forest of Menos.

episodes.name: Ashido, The Soul Reaper Who Came from the Past
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and the others continue exploring the Forest of Menos.

episodes.name: Through the Crumbling Forest, a Million Menos
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and the others escape the Forest of Menos.

episodes.name: Oath! Back Here Alive Again
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and his group arrive in Las Noches.

episodes.name: The Raging Storm! Encounter with the Dancing Arrancar
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki battles against the Arrancar, Dordoni Alessandro Del Socaccio.

episodes.name: Ichigo Strikes Back! This Is My Bankai
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki concludes his battle with Dordoni Alessandro Del Socaccio.

episodes.name: The Devilish Research! Szayelaporro's Plan
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and the others continue going on through Las Noches.

episodes.name: Rukia and Kaien, the Sorrowful Reunion
episodes.overview: Rukia Kuchiki reunites with her deceased mentor, Kaien Shiba.

episodes.name: Rukia Retaliates! Release the Desperate Kidō
episodes.overview: As Rukia Kuchiki battles Kaien Shiba, she struggles with wondering on whether or not he's truly Kaien.

episodes.name: Ishida & Pesche, the United Attack of Friendship
episodes.overview: Uryū Ishida and Pesche Guatiche battle against Cirucci Sanderwicci.

episodes.name: Ishida's Trump Card, Seele Schneider
episodes.overview: Uryū Ishida battles Cirucci Sanderwicci with a new weapon called Seele Schneider.

episodes.name: Right Arm of the Giant, Left Arm of the Devil
episodes.overview: Yasutora Sado realizes his true power and battles against Gantenbainne Mosqueda.

episodes.name: Yasutora Sado Dies! Orihime's Tears
episodes.overview: Yasutora Sado is defeated by Nnoitra Gilga and Lieutenant Renji Abarai is confronted by the Espada Szayelaporro Granz.

episodes.name: Testament, Your Heart is Right Here...
episodes.overview: Rukia Kuchiki recalls her past with Kaien Shiba before she kills Aaroniero Arruruerie.

episodes.name: The Cruel Arrancar, Ulquiorra's Provocation
episodes.overview: As the Espada react to the death of Aaroniero Arruruerie, Ichigo Kurosaki is confronted by Ulquiorra Cifer.

episodes.name: Szayelaporro Laughs, The Net Trapping Renji is Complete
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki battles Ulquiorra Cifer, Lieutenant Renji Abarai struggles with his fight against Szayelaporro Granz.

episodes.name: Shinigami and Quincy, The Battle with Madness
episodes.overview: As Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez saves Orihime Inoue from Loly Aivirrne and Menoly Mallia, Uryū Ishida joins Lieutenant Renji Abarai's battle against Szayelaporro Granz.

episodes.name: Ishida's Strategy, 20-Second Offense and Defense
episodes.overview: While Uryū Ishida and Lieutenant Renji Abarai continue their battle against Szayelaporro Granz, Ichigo Kurosaki is healed by Orihime Inoue.

episodes.name: The Murderous Intent Boils! The Joyful Grimmjow
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki begins his final battle with Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez.

episodes.name: Desperate Effort vs. Desperate Effort! Hollowfied Ichigo
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki continues his battle with Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez, Orihime Inoue struggles dealing with Ichigo's Hollowfication form.

episodes.name: The Moment of Conclusion, The End of Grimmjow
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez conclude their battle.

episodes.name: The New Captain Appears! His Name Is Shūsuke Amagai
episodes.overview: Shūsuke Amagai is appointed as new captain of the 3rd Division.

episodes.name: New Development, the Dangerous Transfer Student Appears!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki meets Rurichiyo Kasumiōji and her two Shinigami guards in the Human World.

episodes.name: Desperate Struggle Under the Moonlit Night, the Mysterious Assassin and Zanpakutō
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki learns more about Rurichiyo Kasumiōji, he is forced to fight off an assassin going after the girl.

episodes.name: Kenryū, the Profusion of Blooming Crimson Flowers
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki is forced to take care of Rurichiyo Kasumiōji, another assassin attempts to kill her.

episodes.name: Kibune Goes to War! The Violent Wind that Rages
episodes.overview: Izuru Kira begins to get depressed over the fact that the 3rd Division members like Makoto Kibune more than him.

episodes.name: The Appearance of the Great Evil! The Darkness in the House of Kasumiōji
episodes.overview: Rurichiyo Kasumiōji is targeted by more assassins after secretly returning to the Soul Society.

episodes.name: Break the Mirror's Boundary! Ichigo's Captivity
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki faces off against the assassin Hanza Nukui.

episodes.name: The Revenging Assassin, Ichigo is Targeted
episodes.overview: Hanza Nukui and his subordinates attack the Human World to kill Ichigo Kurosaki and Rurichiyo Kasumiōji.

episodes.name: Mystery! The Sword-Consuming Assassin
episodes.overview: The fights with the assassins continue.

episodes.name: The Reversal of Rukia! The Rampaging Blade
episodes.overview: Rukia Kuchiki, Uryū Ishida, and Yasutora Sado finish their battles against the assassins.

episodes.name: The Nightmare Which is Shown, Ichigo's Inside the Mirror
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki finishes his battle with Hanza Nukui.

episodes.name: Confrontation!? Amagai vs. Gotei 13
episodes.overview: Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto orchestrates a Menos Grande attack on Soul Society to help him decide on Captain Shūsuke Amagai's proposal to have joint training between the Divisions.

episodes.name: The Princess's Decision, the Sorrowful Bride
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki heads to the Soul Society to stop Rurichiyo Kasumiōji's wedding.

episodes.name: The 2nd Division Sorties! Ichigo is Surrounded
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Rukia Kuchiki try to stop Rurichiyo Kasumiōji's wedding, but they end up getting attacked by the Gotei 13 in the process.

episodes.name: Amagai's True Strength, the Released Zanpakuto!
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki looks for Rurichiyo Kasumiōji, he is confronted by Captain Shūsuke Amagai.

episodes.name: The Darkness Which Moves! Kibune's True Colors
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Izuru Kira and Makoto Kibune face off against each other.

episodes.name: Kira and Kibune, Offense and Defense of the 3rd Division
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Izuru Kira and Makoto Kibune continue their battle.

episodes.name: Ice and Flame! Fierce Fight of Amagai vs. Hitsugaya
episodes.overview: As Lieutenant Izuru Kira concludes his battle with Makoto Kibune, Captain Shūsuke Amagai is forced to battle against Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya.

episodes.name: Sortie Orders! Suppress the House of Kasumiōji
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki is able to save Rurichiyo Kasumiōji, but more problems arise when it is revealed that Captain Shūsuke Amagai was working with Gyōkaku Kumoi.

episodes.name: Ichigo Rages! The Assassin's Secret
episodes.overview: Captain Shūsuke Amagai reveals his true intentions to Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto.

episodes.name: Duel! Amagai vs. Ichigo
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Captain Shūsuke Amagai battle each other.

episodes.name: The Fallen Shinigami's Pride
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Captain Shūsuke Amagai conclude their battle.

episodes.name: Hueco Mundo Chapter, Restart!
episodes.overview: Following a lengthy recap of the events since Sōsuke Aizen betrayed Soul Society, Ichigo Kurosaki concludes his duel with Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez before being confronted by Nnoitra Gilga.

episodes.name: The Frightening Banquet, Szayelaporro Theater
episodes.overview: Szayelaporro Granz releases his Zanpakutō, while Nnoitra Gilga provides a surprising revelation about the true identity of the Arrancar Nel Tu.

episodes.name: Nel's Secret, A Busty Beauty Joins the Battle!?
episodes.overview: Nel Tu transforms back into her original Espada form.

episodes.name: Irresistible, Puppet Show of Terror
episodes.overview: Szayelaporro Granz demonstrates a new technique, whilst Nnoitra Gilga is taken aback by Nelliel Tu Odelschwanck's onslaught.

episodes.name: Neliel's Past
episodes.overview: Nnoitra Gilga recalls his past with Nelliel Tu Odelschwanck.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Union! Pesche's Seriousness
episodes.overview: Nelliel Tu Odelschwanck returns to her child form, leaving Ichigo Kurosaki in the hands of Tesra Lindocruz. Szayelaporro Granz is seemingly impervious to attack, Zommari Rureaux is about to finish off Rukia Kuchiki, whilst the Exequias plan to execute Yasutora Sado.

episodes.name: Joining the Battle! The Strongest Soul Reaper Army Appears
episodes.overview: The Gotei 13 come to the rescue of Ichigo Kurosaki and his comrades.

episodes.name: Byakuya's Bankai, The Quiet Anger
episodes.overview: Zommari Rureaux releases his Zanpakutō, forcing Captain Byakuya Kuchiki to take drastic action to avoid defeat.

episodes.name: The Two Scientists, Mayuri's Trap
episodes.overview: Captain Byakuya Kuchiki finishes off Zommari Rureaux, while Captain Mayuri Kurotsuchi gains the upper hand against Szayelaporro Granz.

episodes.name: Holy Birth, The Resurrected Szayel Aporro
episodes.overview: Captain Mayuri Kurotsuchi decides to end his battle against a reborn Szayelaporro Granz.

episodes.name: The Hardest Body!? Cut Down Nnoitra
episodes.overview: Captain Kenpachi Zaraki and Nnoitra Gilga continue their brawling.

episodes.name: Nnoitra Released! Multiplying Arms
episodes.overview: The battle between Captain Kenpachi Zaraki and Nnoitra Gilga becomes more fierce as Nnoitra releases his Zanpakutō.

episodes.name: Fierce Fighting Conclusion! Who's the Strongest?
episodes.overview: Captain Kenpachi Zaraki and Nnoitra Gilga conclude their battle.

episodes.name: Karakura Town Gathers! Aizen Versus the Soul Reapers
episodes.overview: Sōsuke Aizen reveals his plans and heads to Karakura Town.

episodes.name: Ichigo's Seppuku Persuasion Strategy ☆
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki tries to help out a feuding Rurichiyo Kasumiōji and Kenryū.

episodes.name: Thump! A Kemari Tournament Filled with Hollows
episodes.overview: Rurichiyo Kasumiōji and Kenryū have a kemari match.

episodes.name: The Past Chapter Begins! The Truth from 110 Years Ago
episodes.overview: The past of several Shinigami from 110 years ago is revealed.

episodes.name: 12th Division's New Captain, Urahara Kisuke
episodes.overview: The 12th Division deals with Kisuke Urahara being the new captain.

episodes.name: Aizen and the Genius Boy
episodes.overview: Captain Kisuke Urahara takes Lieutenant Hiyori Sarugaki to the Nest of Maggots.

episodes.name: Muguruma 9th Division, Moves Out
episodes.overview: The Gotei 13 attempt to figure what's behind the disappearances of Rukongai citizens.

episodes.name: Hiyori Dies? The Beginning of Tragedy
episodes.overview: Several Gotei 13 captains and lieutenants face off against a Hollowfied Captain Kensei Muguruma and Lieutenant Mashiro Kuna.

episodes.name: Betrayal! Aizen's Secret Maneuvers
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Sōsuke Aizen reveals himself as a traitor.

episodes.name: Rescue Hirako! Aizen vs. Urahara
episodes.overview: Captains Kisuke Urahara, Tessai Tsukabishi, and Yoruichi Shihōin leave to the Human World with the Hollowfied captains and lieutenants.

episodes.name: The Konso Cop Karakuraizer is Born
episodes.overview: Kisuke Urahara creates the Karakura-Raizer Team to protect Karakura Town.

episodes.name: Karakuraizer's Last Day
episodes.overview: The Karakura-Raizer Team face off against a female Arrancar.

episodes.name: Defend Karakura Town! Entire Appearance of the Shinigami
episodes.overview: As the Gotei 13 prepare to face off against the top three Espada, Ichigo Kurosaki confronts Ulquiorra Cifer.

episodes.name: Elite! The Four Shinigami
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki confronts Ulquiorra Cifer, the battle for the four pillars begins in Karakura Town.

episodes.name: Beautiful Little Devil Charlotte
episodes.overview: 5th Seat Yumichika Ayasegawa and Charlotte Chuhlhourne battle each other.

episodes.name: Kira, The Battle Within Despair
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Izuru Kira, Lieutenant Shūhei Hisagi, and 3rd Seat Ikkaku Madarame continue their fights against Baraggan Louisenbairn's Fracción.

episodes.name: Hisagi's Shikai! The Name is...
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Shūhei Hisagi and Findorr Calius battle each other.

episodes.name: Ikkaku Falls! The Shinigami's Crisis
episodes.overview: 3rd Seat Ikkaku Madarame loses his fight against Choe Neng Poww, forcing Captain Sajin Komamura to take over his battle.

episodes.name: The Full Showdown! Soul Reapers vs. Espada
episodes.overview: Captain Suì-Fēng begins her battle with Ggio Vega while the other two Espada and their Fracción begin their fights.

episodes.name: The Most Evil Tag!? Suì-Fēng & Ōmaeda
episodes.overview: Ggio Vega and Nirgge Parduoc release their Zanpakutōs, prompting Lieutenant Marechiyo Ōmaeda to use his true power.

episodes.name: A Miraculous Body! Ggio Releases
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Marechiyo Ōmaeda and Captain Suì-Fēng struggle against their opponents, but are eventually able to win.

episodes.name: 3 vs. 1 Battle! Rangiku's Crisis
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Momo Hinamori arrives to help out Lieutenant Rangiku Matsumoto, prompting Harribel's Fracción to bring forth Ayon.

episodes.name: Vice-Captains Annihilated! The Terrifying Demonic Beast
episodes.overview: Ayon overpowers the lieutenants, greatly injuring them, but Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto appears to fight the beast.

episodes.name: Fierce Fighting Concludes? Towards a New Battle!
episodes.overview: Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto effortlessly finishes Ayon and Harribel's Fracción. Starrk reveals himself to be the Primera Espada. Rukia Kuchiki fights Rudbornn as Ichigo Kurosaki struggles against Ulquiorra Cifer.

episodes.name: Wonderful Error
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Yasutora Sado become classmates with Mizuiro Kojima and Keigo Asano. Rukia Kuchiki is assigned to Karakura Town and Renji Abarai is promoted.

episodes.name: Summer! Sea! Swimsuit Festival!!
episodes.overview: The characters take a break on the beach.

episodes.name: Cry of the Soul? The Rug Shinigami is Born!
episodes.overview: Ikkaku and Yumichika are forced to stay with Mizuho again while on a mission in the Human World.

episodes.name: A New Enemy! The Materialization of Zanpakutō
episodes.overview: A mysterious Zanpakutō Spirit named Muramasa releases the spirits of many Zanpakutō from their swords and attacks Soul Society.

episodes.name: Byakuya, Disappearing with the Cherry Blossoms
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki battles against the manifested Zanpakutō Spirit of Sode no Shirayuki, who arrives in the Human World while chasing Rukia Kuchiki.

episodes.name: Sode no Shirayuki vs. Rukia! Confused Heart
episodes.overview: Rukia Kuchiki and Ichigo Kurosaki battle Sode no Shirayuki, and Muramasa reveals he is a Zanpakutō Spirit.

episodes.name: Zangetsu Becomes an Enemy
episodes.overview: Muramasa releases Zangetsu, and Ichigo Kurosaki fights him as his inner Hollow begins to take control.

episodes.name: Renji Surprised?! The Two Zabimarus
episodes.overview: 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai is confronted by the spirit of his Zanpakutō, and Muramasa enters Ichigo Kurosaki's inner world.

episodes.name: Clash! Hisagi vs. Kazeshini
episodes.overview: 9th Division Lieutenant Shūhei Hisagi fights his Zanpakutō spirit while Hollow Ichigo fights Muramasa and 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai regains the ability to release his Shikai, Zabimaru.

episodes.name: Release! The New Getsuga Tenshō
episodes.overview: 3rd Division Lieutenant Izuru Kira aids 9th Division Lieutenant Shūhei Hisagi, who is fighting Kazeshini, while 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai and Ichigo Kurosaki conclude their battles.

episodes.name: Suì-Fēng, Surrounding the Zanpakutō
episodes.overview: 11th Division 3rd Seat Ikkaku Madarame and 2nd Division Lieutenant Marechiyo Ōmaeda encounter their Zanpakutō Spirits, and Ichigo Kurosaki spots 6th Division Captain Byakuya Kuchiki.

episodes.name: Friendship? Hatred? Haineko & Tobiume
episodes.overview: 10th Division Lieutenant Rangiku Matsumoto and 5th Division Lieutenant Momo Hinamori battle their Zanpakutō Spirits, and 10th Division Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya tells Hyōrinmaru what his name is while Muramasa limps through the Forest of Menos.

episodes.name: The Awakening Hyōrinmaru! Hitsugaya's Fierce Fight
episodes.overview: As 5th Division Lieutenant Momo Hinamori and 10th Division Lieutenant Rangiku Matsumoto conclude their battle, 10th Division Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya tries to convince Hyōrinmaru he is his master, but the Zanpakutō Spirit does not believe it.

episodes.name: Byakuya's Betrayal
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki attacks Muramasa, but Senbonzakura, and later 6th Division Captain Byakuya Kuchiki, shows up to protect him.

episodes.name: For the Sake of Pride! Byakuya vs. Renji
episodes.overview: Muramasa has 6th Division Captain Byakuya Kuchiki perform a test of loyalty. Afterwards, Byakuya invades the 6th Division barracks and is forced to fight his lieutenant, Renji Abarai.

episodes.name: Shinigami and Zanpakutō, Total Sortie
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki, 2nd Division Captain Suì-Fēng, and 3rd Division Lieutenant Izuru Kira begin their battles, 11th Division 3rd Seat Ikkaku Madarame fights and defeats his Zanpakutō Spirit, Hōzukimaru.

episodes.name: One-to-One Fight! Ichigo vs. Senbonzakura
episodes.overview: As the Shinigami battle the Zanpakutō Spirits, 3rd Division Lieutenant Izuru Kira defeats Kazeshini, only to be attacked by Wabisuke. Meanwhile, 11th Division Captain Kenpachi Zaraki arrives at the battlefield.

episodes.name: The Long Awaited... Kenpachi Appears!
episodes.overview: 11th Division Captain Kenpachi Zaraki arrives and defeats Wabisuke before moving on to 6th Division Captain Byakuya Kuchiki. Meanwhile, 11th Division 5th Seat Yumichika Ayasegawa defeats his manifested Zanpakutō Spirit, Ruri'iro Kujaku.

episodes.name: Pursue Byakuya! The Confused Gotei Divisions
episodes.overview: As 11th Division Captain Kenpachi Zaraki and 6th Division Byakuya Kuchiki fight, 11th Division Lieutenant Yachiru Kusajishi chases Ashisogi Jizō before 12th Division Captain Mayuri Kurotsuchi forces his Zanpakutō Spirit to self-destruct and tells others to not interfere. Muramasa takes Byakuya to see Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto, who is inside of a barrier guarded by a dark-haired woman, two white-haired boys, and a cloaked figure.

episodes.name: Special Mission! Rescue Captain Commander Yamamoto!
episodes.overview: A group of Shinigami attempt to rescue Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto, but they are held back by several Zanpakutō Spirits. Meanwhile, Ichigo Kurosaki arrives at the barrier surrounding Yamamoto and prepares to destroy it.

episodes.name: Deceived Shinigami! The World Collapse Crisis
episodes.overview: As Yoruichi Shihōin, 8th Division Captain Shunsui Kyōraku, 11th Division Captain Jūshirō Ukitake, and 11th Division Captain Kenpachi Zaraki continue to fight against the Zanpakutō Spirits, Ichigo Kurosaki frees Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto, only to learn this was all part of Muramasa's plan.

episodes.name: Dragon of Ice and Dragon of Flame! The Strongest Showdown!
episodes.overview: Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto and the others are held back by Ryūjin Jakka's flames as Muramasa attempts to free Kōga Kuchiki.

episodes.name: Senbonzakura's Bankai! Offense and Defense of the Living World
episodes.overview: 11th Division Captain Kenpachi Zaraki faces off against Tenken's Bankai, Kokujō Tengen Myō'ō, as Muramasa frees his master, Kōga.

episodes.name: That Man, for the Sake of the Kuchiki
episodes.overview: Kōga Kuchiki's past is revealed.

episodes.name: Dark History! The Worst Shinigami Is Born
episodes.overview: 6th Division Captain Ginrei Kuchiki and Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto are forced to seal Kōga Kuchiki away. In the present, 6th Division Captain Byakuya Kuchiki stops Kōga from killing Muramasa.

episodes.name: Byakuya, the Truth Behind His Betrayal
episodes.overview: As Senbonzakura reveals the truth about 6th Division Captain Byakuya Kuchiki's betrayal, Byakuya fights against Kōga Kuchiki. Meanwhile, Muramasa loses controls and unleashes hundreds of Gillians.

episodes.name: Muramasa's True Identity Revealed
episodes.overview: 6th Division Captain Byakuya Kuchiki defeats Kōga Kuchiki as Muramasa loses control and transforms into a Hollow version of himself. As Ichigo Kurosaki battles Muramasa, several Shinigami and their Zanpakutō Spirits arrive to help.

episodes.name: Byakuya and Renji, the 6th Division Returns
episodes.overview: The Shinigami and their Zanpakutō Spirits try to deal with the Gillians.

episodes.name: Final Chapter - Zanpakutō The Alternate Tale
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki defeats Muramasa, and the Zanpakutō Spirits return to their original forms.

episodes.name: The Angered Byakuya! The Collapse of the Kuchiki House
episodes.overview: A party is being held at the Kuchiki Manor when two rogue Zanpakutō Spirits, called Tōjū, attack and disrupt the party.

episodes.name: A New Enemy! The True Nature of the Sword Beasts
episodes.overview: 10th Division Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya battles a Tōjū which has been absorbed by a Hollow.

episodes.name: Stray Snake, Tortured Monkey
episodes.overview: 6th Division Lieutenant Renji Abarai and his Zanpakutō Spirit, Zabimaru, must defeat a Tōjū, but Hebi wants freedom.

episodes.name: Terror! The Monster That Lurks Underground
episodes.overview: A group of Shinigami must go into the sewers to fight a Tōjū. They are aided by a Zanpakutō Spirit who has been living in the sewers.

episodes.name: Conclusion!? Hisagi vs. Kazeshini
episodes.overview: Kazeshini has a change of heart when he is forced to look after a baby.

episodes.name: The Person with the Unknown Ability! Orihime Is Targeted
episodes.overview: Orihime Inoue must help a transfer student who is being controlled by a Tōjū.

episodes.name: Haineko Cries! The Tragic Sword Beast!
episodes.overview: Haineko falls for a Tōjū who is fully aware. However, when he loses control, Haineko decides to defeat him herself.

episodes.name: Imprisonment?! Senbonzakura & Zabimaru
episodes.overview: Zabimaru and Senbonzakura are trapped in the Shinigami Research and Development Institute.

episodes.name: Battle of the Females? Katen Kyōkotsu vs. Nanao!
episodes.overview: 8th Division Lieutenant Nanao Ise tries to relate to the violet-haired girl while they battle a Tōjū.

episodes.name: Evolution?! The Menace of the Final Sword Beast
episodes.overview: The Zanpakutō Spirits struggle with the final Tōjū until their wielders arrive to help.

episodes.name: Ichigo vs. Ulquiorra, Resume
episodes.overview: Prior events are recalled.

episodes.name: Connected Hearts! The Left Fist of Certain Death
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki struggles against Ulquiorra Cifer as Renji Abarai and Yasutora Sado fight Battikaroa.

episodes.name: Hatred and Jealousy, Orihime's Dilemma
episodes.overview: Loly Aivirrne and Menoly Mallia take Orihime Inoue up to where Ichigo Kurosaki is fighting. Yammy Llargo shows up and, after disposing of Loly, is ambushed by Uryū Ishida.

episodes.name: Ichigo and Uryū, Bonded Back to Back
episodes.overview: As Uryū Ishida deals with Yammy Llargo, Ulquiorra Cifer shows Ichigo Kurosaki his Resurrección.

episodes.name: Beginning of Despair... Ichigo, the Unreachable Blade
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki greatly struggles with Ulquiorra Cifer in his released form and to further drive it in, Ulquiorra shows Ichigo his second release.

episodes.name: Ichigo Dies! Orihime, the Cry of Sorrow!
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki's Hollow form completely takes him over, he begins battling Ulquiorra Cifer again.

episodes.name: Ichigo vs. Ulquiorra, Conclusion!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Ulquiorra Cifer conclude their battle.

episodes.name: Fury of the Shark! Halibel's Release
episodes.overview: As Rukia Kuchiki, Yasutora Sado, and Lieutenant Renji Abarai battle Yammy Llargo, the captains in the Fake Karakura Town continue battling the Espada.

episodes.name: Hitsugaya, the Desperate Hyōten Hyakkasō!
episodes.overview: The battle between Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya and Tier Harribel continues.

episodes.name: The Approaching Breath of Death, the King Who Rules Over Death!
episodes.overview: Captain Suì-Fēng and Lieutenant Marechiyo Ōmaeda struggle against Baraggan Louisenbairn.

episodes.name: One Hit Kill, Suì-Fēng, Bankai!
episodes.overview: As Lieutenant Marechiyo Ōmaeda distracts Baraggan Luisenbarn for Captain Suì-Fēng, Captain Shunsui Kyōraku and Coyote Starrk continue their battle.

episodes.name: Climax! Kyōraku vs. Stark!
episodes.overview: Captain Shunsui Kyōraku and Coyote Starrk decide to get serious in their battle.

episodes.name: The Nightmare Returns... Revival of the Espada
episodes.overview: The Espada are shown to still be alive, Sōsuke Aizen, Gin Ichimaru, and Kaname Tōsen are freed, and the Visored arrive on the battlefield.

episodes.name: Hirako and Aizen...the Reunion of Fate!
episodes.overview: The Visored join the fight.

episodes.name: Hisagi and Tōsen, the Moment of Parting
episodes.overview: Hachigen Ushōda helps Captain Suì-Fēng battle Baraggan Luisenbarn.

episodes.name: Crown of Lies, Baraggan's Grudge
episodes.overview: Baraggan Luisenbarn recalls his past as the King of Hueco Mundo before dying.

episodes.name: Power of the Soul! Los Lobos, Attack!
episodes.overview: Love Aikawa and Rōjūrō Ōtoribashi battle against Coyote Starrk.

episodes.name: Stark, the Lone Battle
episodes.overview: Coyote Starrk and Captain Shunsui Kyōraku conclude their battle.

episodes.name: Chain of Sacrifice, Halibel's Past
episodes.overview: As Tier Harribel falls unconscious from her wounds, she recalls her past.

episodes.name: The Hundred-Year Grudge! Hiyori's Revenge
episodes.overview: As the situation begins to get desperate in the Fake Karakura Town, the battle with Yammy Llargo continues in Hueco Mundo.

episodes.name: Ichigo's Return! Protect Karakura Town
episodes.overview: The captains in Hueco Mundo decide to send Ichigo Kurosaki back to Karakura Town.

episodes.name: Side Story! Ichigo and the Magic Lamp
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki has a dream and tries to escape from it.

episodes.name: The Final Trump Card! Ichigo, Towards the Decisive Battle
episodes.overview: As the battle with Yammy Llargo continues, Ichigo Kurosaki begins his return to Karakura Town.

episodes.name: Byakuya vs. Kenpachi?! The Melee Commences
episodes.overview: As Captains Byakuya Kuchiki and Kenpachi Zaraki prepare to battle with each other, Yammy Llargo's anger makes him even stronger than before. Meanwhile, Kaname Tōsen reveals he has Hollowfication to Lieutenant Shūhei Hisagi and Captain Sajin Komamura.

episodes.name: For the Sake of Justice?! The Man Who Deserted the Shinigami
episodes.overview: Kaname Tōsen reveals his true reasons for betraying Soul Society.

episodes.name: Desperate Struggle with Aizen! Hirako, Shikai!
episodes.overview: As Captain Sajin Komamura continues his battle with Kaname Tōsen, Shinji Hirako releases his Zanpakutō against Sōsuke Aizen.

episodes.name: All Out War! Aizen vs. Shinigami
episodes.overview: The Shinigami and Visored vow to protect Ichigo Kurosaki and defeat Sōsuke Aizen.

episodes.name: Hitsugaya, Enraged! Blade of Hatred!
episodes.overview: The Shinigami and Visored, attacking Sōsuke Aizen, are unable to defeat the treacherous captain.

episodes.name: Impossible to Attack? The Sealed Genryūsai!
episodes.overview: Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto joins the battle against Sōsuke Aizen, only for his Zanpakutō's abilities to be sealed by Wonderweiss Margela.

episodes.name: It's All a Trap... Engineered Bonds!
episodes.overview: Sōsuke Aizen reveals to Ichigo Kurosaki that all of his battles have taken place exactly as he desired.

episodes.name: The Shocking Truth...The Mysterious Power Within Ichigo!
episodes.overview: As Sōsuke Aizen reveals more facts to Ichigo Kurosaki, Isshin Kurosaki joins the battle.

episodes.name: The Extending Blade?! Ichigo vs. Gin!
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki and Gin Ichimaru battle, Sōsuke Aizen explains to Isshin Kurosaki about the true power of the Hōgyoku.

episodes.name: Film! Festival! Shinigami Film Festival!
episodes.overview: The Shinigami in the Gotei 13 make a movie for the "Seireitei International Film Festival."

episodes.name: Theatre Opening Commemoration! The Hell Verse: Prologue
episodes.overview: While visiting the World of the Living, Kuchiki Rukia comes across Kurumadani Zennosuke, the current Soul Reaper stationed in Karakura Town, being attacked by a mysterious masked man.

episodes.name: Urahara Appears! Stop Aizen!
episodes.overview: The battle with Sōsuke Aizen continues as Aizen is transformed by the Hōgyoku.

episodes.name: Ichigo Loses His Fighting Spirit!? Gin's Expectation!
episodes.overview: As his transformation progresses, Sōsuke Aizen proves more and more resilient. Ichigo Kurosaki's strength fails to defeat Gin Ichimaru.

episodes.name: The Final Getsuga Tenshō!? Ichigo's Training!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki begins training to learn the Final Getsuga Tenshō. Sōsuke Aizen and Gin Ichimaru arrive in Karakura Town.

episodes.name: Real World and Shinigami! The New Year Special!
episodes.overview: The Soul Reaper Association hosts a New Year’s party in the Soul Society.

episodes.name: Another Side Story! This Time's Enemy Is a Monster!?
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki has another dream and tries to escape from it again.

episodes.name: Delusion Roars! Hisagi, Towards the Hot Springs Inn!
episodes.overview: Lieutenants Shūhei Hisagi and Rangiku Matsumoto go on a mission, and Hisagi deludes himself into thinking that Rangiku likes him.

episodes.name: For the Sake of Protecting! Ichigo vs. Tensa Zangetsu!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki stands his ground against Tensa Zangetsu, who fuses with Ichigo's inner Hollow.

episodes.name: Emergency Situation! Aizen, New Evolution!
episodes.overview: As the Humans run away, Gin Ichimaru betrays Sōsuke Aizen.

episodes.name: Goodbye...Rangiku
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki emerges from his training and forces Sōsuke Aizen into battle away from Karakura Town.

episodes.name: Fierce Fighting Conclusion! Release, the Final Getsuga Tenshō!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki uses the Final Getsuga Tenshō against Sōsuke Aizen.

episodes.name: Ichigo's Resolution! The Price of the Fierce Battle
episodes.overview: The aftermath of the battle with Sōsuke Aizen is shown.

episodes.name: The Soul Detective: Karakuraizer Takes Off Again!
episodes.overview: The continued adventures of Karakura-Raizer.

episodes.name: Inauguration! The Brand New 2nd Division Captain!
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Marechiyo Ōmaeda pretends to be the captain of the Second Division.

episodes.name: The Man Who Risks His Life in the 11th Division!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki meets a member of the 11th Division named Seizo Harugasaki.

episodes.name: Kon Saw It! The Secret of a Beautiful Office Lady
episodes.overview: Kon chases after a beautiful girl, while the rest of Karakura Town is threatened by a Hollow.

episodes.name: Yachiru's Friend! The Shinigami of Justice Appears!
episodes.overview: Lieutenant Yachiru Kusajishi encounters her old Shinigami friend and catches up with him.

episodes.name: Toshirō Hitsugaya's Holiday!
episodes.overview: Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya visits the Human World and visits Haru, an old lady he knew from his first assignment in the Human World.

episodes.name: Unusual Incident in Seireitei?! Gotei 13 Invading Army Arc!
episodes.overview: One month after Sōsuke Aizen's defeat, as things are returning to normal, people begin to disappear in the Dangai.

episodes.name: Renji vs. Rukia?! Battle With Comrades!
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki escapes from his detention, Kagerōza Inaba comes to collect Nozomi Kujō.

episodes.name: Ichigo's Capture Net! Escape From Soul Society!
episodes.overview: As Uryū Ishida battles Kagerōza Inaba, Ichigo Kurosaki and Rukia Kuchiki attempt to escape from Seireitei.

episodes.name: Gotei 13, Gathering in the Real World!
episodes.overview: While the real Gotei 13 have a meeting about the Reigai, Kon is tasked with looking after Nozomi Kujō.

episodes.name: Showdown of Mutual Self, Ikkaku vs. Ikkaku!
episodes.overview: Captains Jūshirō Ukitake and Shunsui Kyōraku investigate the SRDI's records, while the real Gotei 13 officers encounter their Reigai counterparts.

episodes.name: Clash! Rukia vs. Rukia!
episodes.overview: As the Reigai continue their attack, Nozomi Kujō wanders around Karakura in search of something.

episodes.name: Protect Ichigo! Nozomi's Determination
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki defeats many Reigai while protecting Nozomi Kujō.

episodes.name: Recapture Seireitei! The Captains Move!
episodes.overview: The captains return to Soul Society to confront Kagerōza Inaba.

episodes.name: For the Sake of the Believers! Byakuya vs. Hitsugaya!
episodes.overview: As Captain-Commander Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto fights the Reigai, Captain Byakuya Kuchiki encounters a Reigai of Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya.

episodes.name: The Two Hinamori, Hitsugaya's Resolution
episodes.overview: As the captains advance through Seireitei, Captain Tōshirō Hitsugaya encounters a Reigai of Lieutenant Momo Hinamori.

episodes.name: Pride of the Kuchiki Family! Byakuya vs. Byakuya!
episodes.overview: Captains Sajin Komamura, Byakuya Kuchiki, and Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto continue their battles with the Reigai.

episodes.name: Defeat Kageroza! Shinigami, All-Out War!
episodes.overview: The real members of the Gotei 13 arrive at Kagerōza Inaba's lair to challenge him.

episodes.name: The Forbidden Research...Nozomi's Hidden Secret!
episodes.overview: Kagerōza Inaba struggles to recover from Captain Mayuri Kurotsuchi's attack, while his motives and Nozomi Kujō's identity are revealed.

episodes.name: I Want to Live...! Nozomi's Zanpakutō
episodes.overview: As the remaining members of the Gotei 13 try to recover, Nozomi Kujō decides she wants to help the others.

episodes.name: For the Sake of Fighting! The Awakened Nozomi!
episodes.overview: Nozomi Kujō trains with Ichigo Kurosaki and the others while the Reigai assault the Human World once again.

episodes.name: The Most Evil Reigai, Appearing in the Real World!
episodes.overview: Kujou Nozomi tries to join Ichigo and the others to fight the Reigai captains, but the other Soul Reapers tell her not to interfere.

episodes.name: Destroy Nozomi!? Genryusai's Decision!
episodes.overview: Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto steps in to battle against the Reigai. Kurosaki Ichigo and Kujou Nozomi join the fight.

episodes.name: The Depleting Reiatsu! Ichigo, Death Struggle of the Soul!
episodes.overview: Kujou Nozomi’s Zanpakuto breaks in the midst of trying to protect Yamamoto-Genryuusai Shigekuni from Inaba Kagerouza’s attack.

episodes.name: Hiding in the Dangai? Another Ichigo?!
episodes.overview: After being brought back to the Urahara Shop by Kisuke Urahara, Ichigo Kurosaki heads into the Dangai to retrieve his Reishi.

episodes.name: Pursue Kageroza! Technological Development Department, Infiltration!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki, Kon, and Kisuke Urahara infiltrate Soul Society as Inaba begins to fuse with Nozomi Kujō.

episodes.name: The Developer of the Modified Souls
episodes.overview: As Yoruichi Shihōin and the captains battle the Reigai, Ichigo Kurosaki, Kon, and Kisuke Urahara go in search of Kagerōza Inaba's lab.

episodes.name: Kon's Thoughts, Nozomi's Thoughts
episodes.overview: Urahara Kisuke and Kon find Ouko Yushima, the man behind Kageroza’s invasion. Finding traces of Kageroza’s blood nearby, the two follow the trail.

episodes.name: Protect Ichigo! The Bonds of Friends!
episodes.overview: The Gotei 13 battle the Reigai, while the combined form of Inaba and Nozomi Kujō fights off a Hollowfied Ichigo and his friends.

episodes.name: Reigai vs. Original, The Fierce Fighting for Gambled Pride!
episodes.overview: As the merged Inaba Nozomi Kujō is confronted, the captains and lieutenants battle the Reigai.

episodes.name: Invading Army Arc, Final Conclusion!
episodes.overview: As the captains and lieutenants fight against the Reigai, Ichigo Kurosaki uses his restored powers to fight the fused form of Kagerōza Inaba and Nozomi Kujō.

episodes.name: Thank You
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki gradually loses his remaining powers and bids farewell to Rukia Kuchiki.

episodes.name: 3rd Year High School Student! Dressed Up, and a New Chapter Begins!
episodes.overview: Seventeen months later, Ichigo Kurosaki continues living life as a normal teenage high school student in Karakura Town.

episodes.name: A Dispute in School!? Ichigo and Uryū, Fight Together!
episodes.overview: Kurosaki Ichigo’s boss Unagiya Ikumi shows up and drags him back to the office, where he meets a man called Kugo Ginjo.

episodes.name: Uryū is Attacked, A Threat Draws Near the Friends!
episodes.overview: After Ichigo Kurosaki and Orihime Inoue visit Uryū Ishida in the hospital, Keigo Asano is attacked.

episodes.name: The Man with the Fullbring Ability: Kūgo Ginjō
episodes.overview: Ginjou Kuugo tells Kurosaki Ichigo of his goal to restore his lost Soul Reaper powers, as well as demonstrating his own unique power.

episodes.name: A Crisis Sneaking up on the Kurosaki Family!? Ichigo's Confusion!
episodes.overview: Kurosaki Ichigo has a day to decide whether to regain his lost Soul Reaper powers or not.

episodes.name: Power of the Substitute Badge, Ichigo's 'Pride'!
episodes.overview: Kurosaki Ichigo begins training, his first session is to fight and win against Mr. Pork

episodes.name: Next Target, The Devil's Hand Aims at Orihime!
episodes.overview: Inoue Orihime is suddenly stopped and asked to die by a man named Shishigawara Moe.

episodes.name: The Man Who Killed the Shinigami Substitute!? Tsukishima Makes His Move
episodes.overview: Tsuskishima pretends to impale Orihime's chest and leaves her. Although Orihime suffered no cuts, she starts having a vague idea that Tsukishima was her friend. Unwilling to worry Ichigo about what happened, she only tells Chad about Tsukishima. Aware that Orihime is hiding information from, Ichigo goes back to to Xcution headquarters to continue his training to help his friends.

episodes.name: Fullbring, The Detested Power!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki continues his training with Xcution, as they struggle to convince Jackie Tristan to help.

episodes.name: Tsukishima Attacks! The Training Has Been Thwarted
episodes.overview: As Jackie Tristan and Ichigo Kurosaki train in the fish tank, Shūkurō Tsukishima arrives in Xcution's hideout.

episodes.name: Ichigo, Mastering the Fullbring!
episodes.overview: As Shūkurō Tsukishima arrives at Xcution, a battle ensues.

episodes.name: Ichigo vs. Ginjō! To the Game's Space
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki fights Kūgo Ginjō in the Game Space.

episodes.name: Shinigami at War! New Year in Seireitei Special!
episodes.overview: New year celebrations in Soul Society include a kite-flying contest and Rukia performing a celebration dance.

episodes.name: Friend or Foe!? Ginjō's True Intentions!
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki continues his training with Kūgo Ginjō, resulting in him completing his Fullbring.

episodes.name: Tsukishima's Ability, the Danger is Drawing Near!
episodes.overview: Ichigo trains with his Fullbring. Chad and Orihime investigate Tsukishima and engage in battle.

episodes.name: Clash!? Xcution attacks Ginjō
episodes.overview: Uryū leaves the hospital to investigate a Reiatsu that is appearing everywhere. Ichigo's friends and family, as well as the members of Xcution except for Ginjō, have been cut by Tsukishima.

episodes.name: The Sorrowful Battle! Ichigo vs. Sado & Orihime
episodes.overview: Ichigo and Kūgo catch their breath at a secret hideout and formulate a plan. They go to Tsukishima's mansion and engage in battle.

episodes.name: Ichigo vs Uryū!? Who is the Traitor!?
episodes.overview: As Ichigo Kurosaki begins his battle with Shūkurō Tsukishima, Uryū Ishida arrives, and Kūgo Ginjō is cut by Tsukishima.

episodes.name: A New Appearance! The Gotei 13, Arrives!
episodes.overview: Stripped of his Fullbring, the powerless Ichigo Kurosaki is stabbed by Rukia Kuchiki and has his Shinigami powers returned to him.

episodes.name: Revival! Substitute Shinigami: Ichigo Kurosaki!
episodes.overview: The 13 Court Guard Squad Soul Reapers share their Spirit Energy to restore Ichigo Kurosaki’s lost powers.

episodes.name: Fierce Fight! Shinigami vs. XCUTION!
episodes.overview: The Soul Reapers take on the Xcution members in one-on-one battles.

episodes.name: Desperate Struggle!? Byakuya's Troubled Memories
episodes.overview: The battle between Kuchiki Byakuya and Tsukishima Shuukurou escalates as they both push their powers to the limit.

episodes.name: Ichigo vs. Ginjō! Secret of the Substitute Badge
episodes.overview: As the battle between Ichigo Kurosaki, Uryū Ishida, and Kūgo Ginjō intensifies, the truth behind the Substitute Shinigami Badge surfaces.

episodes.name: Changing History, Unchanging Heart
episodes.overview: Ichigo Kurosaki and Ginjou Kuugo both release their Bankai to settle the score.

episodes.name: The Blood Warfare
episodes.overview: The Soul Society is observing a sudden surge in the number of Hollows being destroyed.

episodes.name: Foundation Stones
episodes.overview: Arrancars Nel Tu and Pesche Guatiche have come to seek Ichigo’s help explaining that Hueco Mundo is under attack by an unknown enemy. Unable to ignore the situation, Ichigo and his friends decide to set out for Hueco Mundo.

episodes.name: March of the Starcross
episodes.overview: Ichigo and his friends arrive in Hueco Mundo to confront Quilge Opie and learn that their latest enemy are Quincies.

episodes.name: Kill the Shadow
episodes.overview: The Wandenreich mobilizes its elite force, the Stern Ritter, to annihilate the Soul Society. Creating massive flaming pillars of Reishi as a distraction, the Stern Ritter easily enter the Soul Society to bring carnage to the Soul Reapers.

episodes.name: Wrath as a Lightning
episodes.overview: Quilge Opie uses his power to imprison Ichigo inside the Garganta. As he tries to break free, Ichigo begins to hear, through his Soul Phone, the screams of the Soul Reapers falling to the enemy's onslaught.

episodes.name: The Fire
episodes.overview: Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto confronts Yhwach for the first time in a thousand years. As Yhwach finally draws his sword against Genryusai, the Soul Reapers notice an abnormal change taking place across the Seireitei.

episodes.name: Born in the Dark
episodes.overview: Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto learns that the Yhwach he defeated was an impostor. The real Yhwach then reveals himself and easily kills Genryusai, sending a wave of shock and devastation across the Soul Reapers.

episodes.name: The Shooting Star Project [Zero Mix]
episodes.overview: Rescue efforts are being made across the Seireitei to find and help those who've survived the Stern Ritter attack. Meanwhile, Ichigo meets with Mayuri Kurotsuchi about fixing his broken Tensa Zangetsu.

episodes.name: The Drop
episodes.overview: Squad Zero brings Ichigo back to the Royal Palace to prepare for the coming battle. Meanwhile, Kyoraku is appointed as the new Head Captain to lead the Thirteen Court Guard Squads.

episodes.name: The Battle
episodes.overview: Kenpachi Zaraki removes his eye patch to fight Retsu Unohana, a.k.a. Yachiru Unohana, “The First Kenpachi.” Meanwhile, Ichigo and Renji head to Hoohden to meet Oh-Etsu Nimaiya, the man who is said to have created the Zanpakuto.

episodes.name: Everything but the Rain
episodes.overview: Ichigo is kicked out of the Royal Palace by Oh-etsu Nimaiya for failing his test. When Ichigo next opens his eyes, he finds himself standing in front of his house in the World of the Living.

episodes.name: Everything but the Rain: June Truth
episodes.overview: Squad 10 Captain Isshin Shiba of the Thirteen Court Guard Squads decides to not report his encounter with the Quincy named Masaki Kurosaki in the World of the Living to the Head Captain.

episodes.name: The Blade Is Me
episodes.overview: Ichigo learns that he is the child born of a Soul Reaper and a Quincy. Finally understanding the truth behind his heritage, Ichigo decides to return to Hoohden with a renewed resolve to finish what he has started.

episodes.name: The Last 9 Days
episodes.overview: Ichigo prepares to leave the Royal Palace to return to the Seireitei but is stopped by Hyosube, who claims that Ichigo cannot defeat Yhwach as he is now.

episodes.name: PEACE FROM SHADOWS
episodes.overview: Yhwach sets his plan to end the world in nine days in motion.

episodes.name: THE FUNDAMENTAL VIRULENCE
episodes.overview: Mayuri receives a call from Urahara, who had stayed behind in Hueco Mundo.

episodes.name: HEART OF WOLF
episodes.overview: The Stern Ritters drive the Soul Reapers deeper into a corner.

episodes.name: RAGES AT RINGSIDE
episodes.overview: Kensei Muguruma joins the battle against Masculine.

episodes.name: THE WHITE HAZE
episodes.overview: A fearless Rukia takes on Äs Nödt.

episodes.name: I AM THE EDGE
episodes.overview: Isane and Yachiru are attacked by Gwenael.

episodes.name: THE HEADLESS STAR
episodes.overview: Candice, Meninas, Giselle, and Liltotto try to take down Kenpachi.

episodes.name: MARCHING OUT THE ZOMBIES
episodes.overview: Ichigo tries to stop Yhwach upon learning that his real target lies within the Royal Palace.

episodes.name: MARCHING OUT THE ZOMBIES 2
episodes.overview: Ikkaku, Yumichika, and the Arrancars work together to fight off Giselle’s zombies.

episodes.name: TOO EARLY TO WIN TOO LATE TO KNOW
episodes.overview: Yhwach finally enters the Royal Palace.

episodes.name: THE MASTER
episodes.overview: Yhwach confronts Hyosube, who is protecting the real Royal Palace.

episodes.name: BLACK
episodes.overview: Yhwach performs Auswählen to bestow power to his fallen Royal Guards.

episodes.name: A
episodes.overview: The battle between Squad Zero and Yhwach's Royal Guards for the Soul King rages on.

episodes.name: KILL THE KING
episodes.overview: Ichigo and his friends hurry to the Reio Greater Palace to stop Yhwach.

episodes.name: THE DARK ARM
episodes.overview: Ichigo tries to remove the impaled sword from the Soul King and save his life.

episodes.name: THE BETRAYER
episodes.overview: Ukitake takes the place of the slain Soul King by releasing the power of Mimihagi.

episodes.name: AGAINST THE JUDGEMENT
episodes.overview: Yhwach is overflowing with power from having absorbed the Soul King.

episodes.name: THE HOLY NEWBORN
episodes.overview: The Soul Reapers regroup to prepare their counterattack against the Quincies.

episodes.name: GATE OF THE SUN
